### last Update

```{r last_update_p1}
# valueBox to display the date of the latest update
# title indicating the month that is considered
lastUpdateValue <- paste(lubridate::month(x      = Sys.Date() %m-% months(1), 
                                          label  = TRUE,
                                          abbr   = FALSE,
                                          locale = "en_US.UTF-8"),
                         lubridate::year(x = Sys.Date()),
                         sep = " ")

valueBox(value = lastUpdateValue,
         color = primary,
         icon = "glyphicon-calendar")
```
